answers_C: Food makes us grow and remain healthy; provides energy; builds body tissues; repairs damaged cells; protects against diseases.

Energy giving food (e.g., yam, maize, cassava) provide energy. Body-Building food (e.g., beans, eggs, fish, meat) supply protein for body growth and repair. Fatty food (e.g., butter, vegetable oil, cheese) provide fat and oil for cell repair. Protective food (e.g., fruits and vegetables) protect against diseases.
A balanced diet contains all classes of food (Carbohydrate, protein, vitamins, minerals) in right amounts. Benefits include making bones and teeth strong, and providing energy and strength.
Bathing is washing the body with clean water, soap, and sponge. Essential materials are toilet soap, sponge, clean water, and a bucket.
Regular bathing is crucial to be clean, neat, smell nice, and to be free from body odour, contributing to overall personal hygiene and health.
